title: Request device logs
name: getDeviceLogs
description: Fetches the logs from the device and reports them to the deviceLogsReady event.

parameters.name: device
parameters.notes: This parameter specifies to the system which device you want to use for the operations. If none is supplied the system will attempt to use a default device, if any.

elements.name: deviceLogsReady
elements.description: Invoked when hapi has finished downloading logs from the card reader.

elements.name: Boolean
elements.description: true if the operation was successfully sent to device

title: Request device logs
name: getDeviceLogs
description: Fetches the logs from the device and reports them to the deviceLogsReady event.

elements.name: deviceLogsReady
elements.description: Invoked when hapi has finished downloading logs from the card reader.

elements.name: Boolean
elements.description: true if the operation was successfully sent to device

title: Request device logs
name: getDeviceLogs
description: Fetches the logs from the device and reports them to the deviceLogsReady event.

parameters.name: device
parameters.notes: This is used if you want to send the operation to a specific device. Recommended if you are using multiple devices

elements.name: deviceLogsReady
elements.description: Invoked when hapi has finished downloading logs from the card reader.

elements.name: Boolean
elements.description: true if the operation was successfully sent to device
